name: Tunica Roadhouse Casino & Hotel

reviews.title: Hated the Sheraton
reviews.text: I did not actually stay at the hotel, but my visit to the casino and one of the restaurants was enough to make me know I would never CONSIDER staying there, nor will I spend any of my money there again.

reviews.title: Great time,Great Breakfast
reviews.text: Louie's Steakhouse was barely average, the salad bar was obviously untouched sinced lunchtime and we were there at about 8:00 pm---no way would I eat any of the mayonnaise based salads, fearful of ptomaine poisoning. The steak was so-so, the rest of the experience was bad due to an annoying, touchy-feely waiter. Yuk. As far as the casino, I was shocked to be confronted by a racist dealer at the Let It Ride table, who actually freely used the "N" word while dealing. I turned him in, I hope he was fired. I thought the Sheraton was dingy, dirty and low-class in everyway. On the other hand, we stayed at the Horseshoe next door and LOVED it.

reviews.title: We Had a Great Time..Thanks!!
reviews.text: Your casino slots are really loose, and your breakfast was divine, Thanks Anthony from AL

reviews.title: thanks
reviews.text: My wife and I stayed at your hotel last month and we had a great time. The rooms were very nice(especially the in room hot tubs). The food was great and the staff was extremely helpful and very nice. We are coming back to Tunica in April and The Sheraton is where we will stay. We have stayed at almost all of the casinos in Tunica and we feel the Sheraton is the very best. Thanks again for a wonderful time.

reviews.title: WOW what a jacuzzi
reviews.text: Well first you have to comment on the jacuzzi. WOW is an understatement. The room we had was just way in excess of my expectations.

reviews.title: Excellant
reviews.text: The room was large and spacious with a king bed. The bathroom was huge and all in all the cleanliness was unbeatable.
This was an excellent room. The casino was not the best there but who cares with a room like that....
reviews.title: Loved the Sheraton!
good comps
reviews.text: I stayed at the Sheraton in Tunica, MS on September 30, 2004 and was EXTREMELY pleased.

reviews.title: Sheraton Tunica Mississippi 10*
reviews.text: The room was nicer than any room I have ever stayed in while in Tunica. The staff was very courteous and caring. I had a problem that required attention from maintenance (the toilet needed a part replaced). Maintenance arrived within 10 minutes and fixed the problem immediately. The maintenance person was very cordial. I would recommend this hotel to anyone who wants to feel pampered.

description: Tunica Roadhouse Casino & Hotel opens December 18, 2009 in Northern Tunica County, Mississippi, just 12 miles from Tennessee state line at Casino Center off of the historic and official Mississippi Blues Highway U.S. 61. The 92,000 square-foot casino features 33,000 square feet of gaming space, over 800 slots and video poker machines, 36 table games, 2 pool tables, 2 beer pong tables, an electronic bull, designated motorcycle parking a fitness center and a gift shop. All 134 spacious and elegant suites contain a king size bed and, granite, marble and a Jacuzzi.
